description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows cloud files mini filter driver:

1. Download the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version.

   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5034123: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5034122: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - For other versions, refer to the respective KB articles provided below.

2. Install the downloaded updates on your system.

3. Restart your system to apply changes and ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- Applying the appropriate KB updates will address the elevation of privilege vulnerability identified in CVE-2024-21310.
- Ensure your system architecture (x64 or 32-bit) corresponds with the update you're downloading.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify your Windows version and corresponding build numbers listed in the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding to avoid data loss during the update process.
